overview: Morgan Rain - Her stepfather promises to keep her secret if she's willing to make his load in her face!  Emily Willis - Stepdad gives her a gift, a warm creampie!  Sybil - There's no denying that she knew exactly what she was doing when she went to his room completely naked!  Leah Lee - This young girl knows just what to do to get her stepdad to give her what she wants!
title: Twisted Family Secrets 8
